meanings.definition: Attractive in a stylish or flashy way.
meanings.sent1: She wore a snazzy dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The new car had a snazzy paint job.
meanings.sent3: His snazzy tie caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The snazzy decorations lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The snazzy shoes completed her outfit perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The snazzy sunglasses were a hit with the teenagers.
meanings.sent2: She always picks out the snazziest outfits.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog looked snazzy in its little sweater.
meanings.sent4: The snazzy hairstyle made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The snazzy handbag was the envy of her friends.

meanings.sent1: The snazzy jewelry sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The snazzy car turned heads as it drove by.
meanings.sent3: His snazzy dance moves entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The snazzy phone case was hard to miss.
meanings.sent5: The snazzy watch added a touch of elegance to his outfit.
